name: Hot And Lovely ：Suger
description:
Background introduction:
As an ordinary man, you encounter a mysterious incident and travel to a game world full of various female characters. When you find that you must get along with these female characters and understand their stories, in order to solve the mysteries of this world and find Way back to the real world.
Of course, in the interaction with each female character, you gradually develop feelings...
It's just that the strange nurse sister, the mysterious boss sister, the cute student sister, and the weird alien girl, etc., they all seem to need to rely on men to survive...?
Sure enough, this world is not as simple as you imagined...!

Character introduction:

Jiue——Weird alien girl
The girl with the horns is firmly tied up at a high place. You have just woken up and can't control your body yet, so you can only stick your neck and look around...

Youmei——The mysterious boss sister
She stood in the lounge with an angry look on her face and glanced at the door uneasily. You followed her, wondering what would happen?

Jiuhui——Cute student sister
Jiuhui’s classmate always behaves like he doesn’t pay attention to anyone at school! As a tablemate, you know that she plays games every night. But when she continues to lie on the table listlessly, you can't help but wonder what game it is?

Hesha - the lively and aloof school beauty
The most dazzling and arrogant girl in the whole grade invites you to play with her at her house on Christmas night after graduation...

  • What you will experience in this game:
  • Unique and innovative 12 plot stories
  • Casual, fun and classic match-3 mini-game
  • Cute, beautiful and unique female characters
  • Skip with one click
